short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides Medium.com articles from Hacker News and Designer News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide Medium hides articles from Medium.com on Hacker News and Designer News. When on, it reports how many items, if any, were hidden on pageload. You can toggle it on and off directly from your browser.

Version History:
1.1 - Updated to work with DN's new domain
1.0 -  A new extension is born!
